weka.attributeSelection.ssf.validationCriteria
Class SimplifiedSilhouette

java.lang.Object
  weka.attributeSelection.ssf.validationCriteria.ValidationCriteria
      weka.attributeSelection.ssf.validationCriteria.SimplifiedSilhouette
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
public class SimplifiedSilhouette
extends ValidationCriteria
implements java.io.Serializable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

Simplified Silhouette relative criteria for partition quality assessment.For more information see:

Eduardo R. Hruschka, Ricardo J.G.B. Campello, Leandro N. de Castro (2006). Evolving clusters in gene-expression data. Information Sciences. 176(13):1898-1927.

BibTeX: 

 @article{Hruschka2006,
    author = {Eduardo R. Hruschka and Ricardo J.G.B. Campello and Leandro N. de Castro},
    journal = {Information Sciences},
    number = {13},
    pages = {1898-1927},
    title = {Evolving clusters in gene-expression data},
    volume = {176},
    year = {2006},
    ISSN = {0020-0255}
 }
